about_the_game:
"Meet Your Maker: Sector 3 Arsenal Pack

Meet Your Maker’s Sector 3 Arsenal Pack introduces a powerful new weapon and an insidious new trap to your arsenal.


Built deep within the ruins of a chemical factory, the Genebank was humanity’s last great hope for survival. With massive fortifications, the Fort Hope facility was set to preserve genetic duplicates of all forms of life known to man.


Until a brutal war between rival factions erupted, and fanatic zealots wielding impenetrable shields overran the fort’s defenses. When it was clear that all was lost, a massive explosive device was detonated, flooding the land with toxic chemicals and permanently erasing the entirety of the planet’s genetic memory.


The Sector 3 Arsenal Pack contains:

1 New Weapon:

Lodestar Shield

A powerful tactical shield that enables its bearer to create a safe zone from which they can take apart defenses. Salvaged from the wrecks of cargo drones, the shield’s core emits an impenetrable barrier that can withstand anything.

1 New Trap:

Launchpad Trap

A disarmingly simple device with an mischievous level of lethality. The Launchpad activates with proximity sensors to hurl any trespassers to a certain death (or not). Best used in devious combinations, this trap is a must for any fortification project. "

When it was clear that all was lost, a massive explosive device was detonated, flooding the land with toxic chemicals and permanently erasing the entirety of the planet’s genetic memory.

A disarmingly simple device with an mischievous level of lethality. The Launchpad activates with proximity sensors to hurl any trespassers to a certain death (or not). Best used in devious combinations, this trap is a must for any fortification project. "

short_description: Meet Your Maker’s Sector 3 Arsenal Pack introduces a powerful new weapon and an insidious new trap to your arsenal. Venture through the war-torn acid wastes, to Fort Hope, and witness humanity’s failed attempt at preserving the planet’s Genetic memory.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
